Summary:
Granulate is an Israeli startup that offers real-time continuous optimization solutions to organizations running applications on Amazon Web Services (AWS). By optimizing applications at the operating system level, Granulate improves throughput and performance, reducing cloud costs by up to 60% and response time by 40%. Granulate has been recognized as an AWS Service Ready partner, with an Amazon Linux 2 Ready Product designation, meaning that its solution passed technical validation and has successful customer adoption. With its Amazon Linux 2 expertise, Granulate can provide specialized customer offerings and optimized solutions to reach customers that are a better technical fit. 

Granulate's AWS partnership has helped drive its business growth, resulting in a 300% year-over-year growth in revenue for the past two years. Through its partnership with AWS, Granulate has access to new technologies and services, ongoing sales and marketing projects, and can provide customized solutions to its customers. The company has recently launched a new product, gProfiler, an open-source platform that helps organizations measure the performance of code production for cloud applications.
